Package org.neo4j.storageengine.api

Interface LogVersionRepository

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    MetadataProvider
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MetaDataStore, ReadOnlyLogVersionRepository
    public interface LogVersionRepository

      long getCurrentLogVersion()

    • Method Detail

      • getCurrentLogVersion

        long getCurrentLogVersion()
        Returns the current log version. It is non blocking.

      • setCurrentLogVersion

        void setCurrentLogVersion​(long version,
                          PageCursorTracer cursorTracer)
        Set current log version
        Parameters:
        version - new current log version

      • incrementAndGetVersion

        long incrementAndGetVersion​(PageCursorTracer cursorTracer)
        Increments (making sure it is persisted on disk) and returns the latest log version for this repository. It does so atomically and can potentially block.
        Parameters:
        cursorTracer - underlying page cursor tracer.
        Returns:
        the latest log version for this repository.

      • getCheckpointLogVersion

        long getCheckpointLogVersion()

      • setCheckpointLogVersion

        void setCheckpointLogVersion​(long version,
                             PageCursorTracer cursorTracer)
        Set checkpoint log version
        Parameters:
        version - new current log version

      • incrementAndGetCheckpointLogVersion

        long incrementAndGetCheckpointLogVersion​(PageCursorTracer cursorTracer)
        Increments (making sure it is persisted on disk) and returns the latest checkpoint log version for this repository. It does so atomically and can potentially block.
        Parameters:
        cursorTracer - underlying page cursor tracer.
        Returns:
        the latest checkpoint log version for this repository.
